languages.text: "При этом же я чувствую небывалое волнение и... нетерпение. Наконец я оказалась за пределами привычных стен — в мире, который видела лишь на страницах книг. Один ваш корабль полон чудных артефактов и занятных вещиц. А сколько еще всего за его пределами! Наверное... мой восторг кажется вам детской нелепостью? И в душе вы потешаетесь надо мной".

traits.locale_text: "При этом же я чувствую небывалое волнение и... нетерпение. Наконец я оказалась за пределами привычных стен — в мире, который видела лишь на страницах книг. Один ваш корабль полон чудных артефактов и занятных вещиц. А сколько еще всего за его пределами! Наверное... мой восторг кажется вам детской нелепостью? И в душе вы потешаетесь надо мной".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."
languages.original_text: "При этом же я чувствую небывалое волнение и... нетерпение. Наконец я оказалась за пределами привычных стен — в мире, который видела лишь на страницах книг. Один ваш корабль полон чудных артефактов и занятных вещиц. А сколько еще всего за его пределами! Наверное... мой восторг кажется вам детской нелепостью? И в душе вы потешаетесь надо мной".

And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, does it not? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Gleichzeitig bin ich überwältigt von neuer Aufregung und ... Vorfreude. Endlich habe ich meine vertrauten Wände verlassen und eine Welt betreten, die ich bisher nur in den Seiten von Büchern gesehen habe. Schon allein Euer Schiff ist ein Füllhorn an erstaunlichen Artefakten und Kuriositäten. Und stellt Euch nur vor, was außerhalb des Schiffs noch auf mich wartet! Aber ... meine Freude muss Euch kindisch vorkommen, nicht wahr? In Eurem Herzen findet Ihr all das gewiss sehr amüsant."
languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."

traits.locale_text: "Gleichzeitig bin ich überwältigt von neuer Aufregung und ... Vorfreude. Endlich habe ich meine vertrauten Wände verlassen und eine Welt betreten, die ich bisher nur in den Seiten von Büchern gesehen habe. Schon allein Euer Schiff ist ein Füllhorn an erstaunlichen Artefakten und Kuriositäten. Und stellt Euch nur vor, was außerhalb des Schiffs noch auf mich wartet! Aber ... meine Freude muss Euch kindisch vorkommen, nicht wahr? In Eurem Herzen findet Ihr all das gewiss sehr amüsant."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Et en même temps, je me sens submergée par une exaltation et... un sentiment d'attente que je n'avais jamais ressentis. J'ai enfin quitté mes murs familiers pour entrer dans un monde que je n'avais vu jusque-là que dans les pages des livres. Votre vaisseau est à lui seul un coffre aux trésors rempli de curiosités et d'artefacts remarquables. Et imaginez un peu les choses qui vous attendent au-delà ! Mais... ma joie doit vous paraître enfantine, non ? Au fond de votre cœur, vous devez trouver tout cela assez amusant. »
languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."

traits.locale_text: « Et en même temps, je me sens submergée par une exaltation et... un sentiment d'attente que je n'avais jamais ressentis. J'ai enfin quitté mes murs familiers pour entrer dans un monde que je n'avais vu jusque-là que dans les pages des livres. Votre vaisseau est à lui seul un coffre aux trésors rempli de curiosités et d'artefacts remarquables. Et imaginez un peu les choses qui vous attendent au-delà ! Mais... ma joie doit vous paraître enfantine, non ? Au fond de votre cœur, vous devez trouver tout cela assez amusant. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “与此同时，我感到自己被某种新奇的兴奋和期待所淹没。我终于踏出了熟悉的高墙，来到了对过去的我而言只存在于书中的世界。你的飞船本身就是一座包罗万象的巨大宝库，堆满了各种各样的奇珍异宝。想象一下，未来还有多少冒险正等着我！可是……这样的喜悦在你看来，肯定十分幼稚吧？你肯定觉得我的样子很可笑吧。”
languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."

traits.locale_text: “与此同时，我感到自己被某种新奇的兴奋和期待所淹没。我终于踏出了熟悉的高墙，来到了对过去的我而言只存在于书中的世界。你的飞船本身就是一座包罗万象的巨大宝库，堆满了各种各样的奇珍异宝。想象一下，未来还有多少冒险正等着我！可是……这样的喜悦在你看来，肯定十分幼稚吧？你肯定觉得我的样子很可笑吧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしは同時に、新たな刺激と…期待に、自分が圧倒されていることに気づきました。とうとう自分にとってなじみのある壁を出て、これまでは本のページの中でしか見たことのない世界へと足を踏み出したのです。{name}様の船だけでも、注目すべきアーティファクトと珍しいものの宝庫です。その向こうに何が待っているか、想像してみてください！でも…あたくしの喜びは、{name}様には子供じみて見えるのではないですか？心の中では、{name}様はこういうことをとても面白いと思っているに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは同時に、新たな刺激と…期待に、自分が圧倒されていることに気づきました。とうとう自分にとってなじみのある壁を出て、これまでは本のページの中でしか見たことのない世界へと足を踏み出したのです。{name}様の船だけでも、注目すべきアーティファクトと珍しいものの宝庫です。その向こうに何が待っているか、想像してみてください！でも…あたくしの喜びは、{name}様には子供じみて見えるのではないですか？心の中では、{name}様はこういうことをとても面白いと思っているに違いありません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «También me siento abrumada por las nuevas emociones e... ilusiones. Por fin he salido fuera y me he adentrado en otro mundo que solo había visto antes en las páginas de los libros. Su nave en sí es un tesoro de artefactos y curiosidades. ¡Imagínese entonces lo que espera fuera! Mi deleite debe parecerle infantil, ¿verdad? En el fondo le parecerá algo divertido».
languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."

traits.locale_text: «También me siento abrumada por las nuevas emociones e... ilusiones. Por fin he salido fuera y me he adentrado en otro mundo que solo había visto antes en las páginas de los libros. Su nave en sí es un tesoro de artefactos y curiosidades. ¡Imagínese entonces lo que espera fuera! Mi deleite debe parecerle infantil, ¿verdad? En el fondo le parecerá algo divertido».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."

languages.text: "Öte yandan, kendimi yeni heyecan ve... Beklentilere gark olmuş buluyorum. Nihayet alıştığım o duvarların dışına, yalnızca kitaplarda okuduğum bir dünyaya adım attım. Sırf bu gemi bile muazzam eserlerle, değişik nesnelerle dolu bir hazine. Bir de beni buranın ötesinde bekleyenleri düşününce... Bu neşem sana çocuksu geliyordur elbette. İçten içe hâlime gülüyor, benimle eğleniyorsundur."
languages.original_text: "At the same time, I find myself overwhelmed with new excitement and... anticipation. At last, I have set foot outside my familiar walls and into a world that I have only seen before in the pages of books. Your ship alone is a treasure trove of remarkable artefacts and curiosities. And just imagine the things that await beyond! But... my delight must seem childish to you, surely? In your heart, you must be finding all this quite amusing."
